body.head: Reminiscences 64
body.p:
—I saw the bloody holocaust of the Wilderness the C Manassas I saw the wounded & the dead, & never forget them (They have
e E ver since
have they been
fused with me—they have fused ever since in my poems;—They are here forever my poems
